FuncDef:
The bfd command enables Bidirectional Forwarding Detection (BFD) globally and displays the global BFD view.
The undo bfd command disables BFD globally. The bfd command enables Bidirectional Forwarding Detection (BFD) globally and displays the global BFD view. The undo bfd command disables BFD globally. By default, BFD is disabled.
Examples: Warning: The BFD process will be deleted. Continue? [Y/N]:Y
ExtraInfo: To use BFD to rapidly detect a link failure, run the bfd command to enable BFD globally.
